page.title: 12CUBS
page.content:
One of the clubs I go to are 'Cubs'. I go there every Monday night dressed in my uniform which is a green jersey and a blue and yellow scarf. At 'Cubs' I am in the red six, the other is the white six. The red six and the white six mostly play games together. Which ever six wins each game gets a pea. At the end of the month the peas are counted up. The six with the most peas wins and gets to keep a leather shield for the rest of the month. Soon I will become a seconder who is second in charge of his six.
I am also a member of the 'Watch Club' which is a club that studies nature, old buildings and sometimes goes camping.
